textAfterTable: Goaltenders # NAME HEIGHT WEIGHT CATCHES PLACE OF BIRTH BIRTHDATE 2012-2013 TEAM 30 Carter Hutton 6-1 195 Left Thunder Bay, Ont. 12/19/85 Rockford (AHL)/Chicago (NHL) 35 Pekka Rinne 6-5 206 Left Kempele, Finland 11/3/82 Nashville (NHL)/Dinamo Minsk (KHL) Underlined - attending camp on a tryout agreement Anyone else notice a theme here that we've never really seen before? Everyone of the players are 6' and above. As a matter of fact, the forwards average 73.8" (6'1.8") and the defense average 74.8" (6'2.8") for an average of 74.2" (6'2.2") for the 18 skaters. Add the goalies in who average 75" (6'3") and it brings the total average for the 20 man roster up to 74.3" (6'2.3"). This team shouldn't be pushed around too easily...
